title: BrooksFalls54September 17, 2022
description:
Gene Simmons in bear form #2
	Brooks Falls, Katmai National Park
author: kopperlben
generated_description: A large brown bear stands in rushing waterfall spray with its mouth wide open in an expressive pose. The bear appears to be fishing for salmon at the base of the powerful waterfall. Mist and white water create a dramatic backdrop as the bear displays its impressive size and fishing behavior.
